subject: p17340686
History: CHF and renal failure, on hemodialysis.
Findings: In comparison with the study of, there is little overall change. Continued enlargement of the cardiac silhouette with moderate-to-severe pulmonary edema. Opacification at the left base may reflect effusion and atelectasis. Hemodialysis catheter again extends to probably the upper portion of the right atrium.
